sentences.text: Dear fellow stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend our 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held at our offices at 1001 Louisiana Street, Houston, Texas, on Wednesday, May 10, 2017, at 10:00 a.m. local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The accompanying proxy statement describes the matters to be presented for approval at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representation of your shares at the meeting is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I urge each stockholder, whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, to vote promptly over the Internet or elephone or by mailing a completed proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to vote begin on page ii of the proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard D. Kinder Executive Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON MAY 10, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To our stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting of our Stockholders will be held at our offices at 1001 Louisiana Street, Houston, Texas, on Wednesday, May 10, 2017, at 10:00 a.m. local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting, the holders of our common stock will act on the following matters:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) the election of the nominated directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) the ratification of the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) four stockholder proposals contained in the proxy statement accompanying this notice, if properly presented by the stockholder proponents at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These items of business are more fully described in the accompanying proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only holders of shares of our common stock as of the close of business on March 13, 2017, the record date, are entitled to receive notice of and to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A list of all registered holders entitled to vote is on file at our principal offices at 1001 Louisiana Street, Suite 1000, Houston, Texas, and will be available for inspection for any purpose germane to the meeting by any stockholder during the meeting and during business hours for ten days prior to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the meeting in person, please cast your vote in advance as soon as possible using one of the methods described in the accompanying proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote over the Internet or telephone or by mailing a completed proxy card or voting instruction card, as applicable, all as described in the proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder attending the meeting who presents appropriate documentation described in the proxy statement may revoke an earlier vote by proxy and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the "Notice and Access" rules adopted by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), we have elected to provide our stockholders access to our proxy materials by posting such documents on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, on March 31, 2017, an Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice) was mailed to the holders of our common stock as of the close of business on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning on March 31, 2017, stockholders have the ability to access the proxy materials on a website referred to in the Notice, or to request that a printed set of the proxy materials be sent to them, by following the instructions on the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IF YOU PLAN TO ATTEND:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that space constraints make it necessary to limit attendance to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Guests of stockholders will not be permitted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission to the meeting will be on a first-come, first-served basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registration will begin at 9:00 a.m., and seating will begin at 9:30 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will be asked to present valid picture identification, such as a driver's license or passport.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders holding stock in brokerage accounts will also need to bring the voting instruction card that they received from their broker, trustee or other nominee in connection with the meeting, or a copy of a brokerage statement reflecting stock ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cameras, recording devices and other electronic devices will not be permitted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard D. Kinder Executive Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 31, 2017 Houston, Texas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY SUMMARY 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary contains highlights about this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary does not contain all of the information that you should consider in advance of the annual meeting, and we encourage you to read the entire proxy statement and our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 carefully before voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless stated otherwise or the context otherwise requires, all references in this proxy statement to "we," "us," "our," "KMI" or the "company" are to Kinder Morgan, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: W refer to our Class P common stock as our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MEETING INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Date and time:  Wednesday, May 10, 2017, 10:00 a.m. local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Place:  KMI's offices at 1001 Louisiana Street, Houston, Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record date:  The close of business on March 13, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of common stock as of the close of business on the record date may vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share is entitled to one vote on each matter to be voted upon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING MATTERS AND BOARD RECOMMENDATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table summarizes the proposals to be considered at the meeting and our Board's voting recommendation with respect to each proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal   Board Recommendation   Page Reference   Election of 16 directors, each for a one-year term expiring in 2018   FOR EACH NOMINEE    37  Ratification of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017   FOR     42  Four stockholder proposals, if properly presented by the stockholder proponents at the meeting   AGAINST EACH PROPOSAL     43

sentences.text: HOW TO VOTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares by any of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Internet:  View proxy materials and vote online by following the instructions provided in the Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials that you receive from us or your broker, trustee or other nominee or, if you have elected to receive a paper copy of the proxy materials, by following the instructions on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone:   Vote by telephone by following the instructions on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail:   If you elected to receive your proxy materials by mail, you may vote by completing and returning a signed paper proxy card (if you are the registered holder of your shares) or by following the vote-by-mail instructions included on the voting instruction form provided by your broker, trustee or other nominee (if your shares are held beneficially in street name).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you did not elect to receive your proxy materials by mail, you may request the materials and vote accordingly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person at the Meeting:   If you are the registered holder of your shares, you may vote in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, on the other hand, you hold your shares through a broker, trustee or other nominee, you must first obtain a "legal proxy" from your broker, trustee or other nominee, and you must provide a copy of your legal proxy to us in order to vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is furnishing you with this proxy statement in connection with the solicitation of proxies on its behalf to be voted at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders and any postponements or adjournments thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS ABOUT THE ANNUAL MEETING AND VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between a registered holder and a "street name" holder?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A., you are considered the stockholder of record with respect to those shares, referred to in this proxy statement as a "registered" holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the registered holder, you have the right to vote in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a brokerage account or by another nominee or trustee, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in "street name."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A street name holder is not the stockholder of record entitled to vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as a beneficial owner, you have the right to direct your broker or other nominee regarding how to vote the shares held in your account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote on the matters presented at the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders who owned our common stock as of the close of business on March 13, 2017, which we refer to as the record date, are entitled to receive notice of, and to vote their common stock owned as of the close of business on the record date at, the annual meeting and any postponements or adjournments of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you owned our common stock as of the close of business on the record date, you are authorized to vote those shares at the annual meeting, even if you subsequently sell them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see "How do I vote?" below for important information regarding how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a notice in the mail regarding the Internet availability of proxy materials instead of a full set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In compliance with SEC rules that allow companies to furnish their proxy materials over the Internet, we sent our registered holders an Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials (the "Notice") instead of a paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or how to request a paper copy may be found in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder, you will receive your Notice from your broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I vote my shares by filling out and returning the Notice?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice will, however, provide instructions on how to vote over the telephone or Internet, or by requesting and returning a signed paper proxy card or voting instruction card, as applicable, or submitting a ballot at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote your shares by any of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By InternetIf you have Internet access, you may view proxy materials and vote online by following the instructions provided in the Notice or, if you have elected to receive a paper copy of the proxy materials, by following the instructions on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By TelephoneIf you have elected to receive a paper copy of the proxy materials, you may submit your vote by telephone by following the instructions on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may request a paper copy of the proxy materials by following the instructions provided in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By MailIf you elected to receive your proxy materials by mail, you may vote by completing and returning a signed paper proxy card (if you are the registered holder of your shares) or by following the vote-by-mail instructions included on the voting instruction form provided by your broker, trustee or other nominee (if your shares are held beneficially in street name).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you did not elect to receive your proxy materials by mail, you may request the materials and vote accordingly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a registered holder, you have the right to vote in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street Name Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder and you wish to vote in person at the meeting, you must obtain a "legal proxy" from your broker, trustee or other nominee that holds your shares, giving you the right to vote your shares in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the day of the meeting, you will need to provide a copy of such legal proxy in order to obtain a ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the annual meeting, your plans may change, so it is a good idea to complete, sign and return your proxy card or voting instruction form, or vote over the telephone or the Internet in advance of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder attending the meeting who presents the appropriate documentation may revoke an earlier vote by proxy and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I access the proxy materials over the Internet?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can view the proxy materials related to the annual meeting on the Internet website listed on your Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please have your control number available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your control number can be found on your Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you requested and received a paper copy of your proxy materials, your control number can be found on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also may access the proxy materials through our website at http://annualmeeting.kindermorgan.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean if I receive more than one Notice?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It means that you have multiple accounts at Computershare and/or with one or more brokers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote using each control number to ensure that all your shares are voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have one vote for each share of common stock that you owned as of the close of business on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares must be present to conduct the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the annual meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of our common stock outstanding as of the close of business on the record date will onstitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence of a quorum will permit us to conduct the proposed business at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the close of business on the record date, ,232,442,180 shares of common stock were issued and outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, holders of at least 1,116,221,091 shares of common stock must be present in person or by proxy o constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your common stock will be counted as present at the annual meeting if you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: have properly submitted a proxy card or voting instruction card, as applicable, or voted over the telephone or the Internet before the meeting; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: attend the meeting, if you are a registered holder or have a legal proxy from your broker, if you are a street name holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: roxies received but marked as abstentions and broker non-votes will be included in the number of shares considered present at the annual mee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If my shares are held in a brokerage account, will my broker vote my shares for me?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally not.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker cannot use discretionary authority to vote your shares on any of the matters to be considered at the annual meeting other than the ratification of the selection of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, it is important that you provide voting instructions to any broker holding shares on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Follow the directions on your Notice or voting instruction card regarding how to instruct your broker to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if I do not specify a choice for a proposal when returning a proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered holder and you sign and return a paper proxy card and no direction is given for any item on the proxy card, it will be voted for the election of the nominated slate of directors, for the ratification of the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017, and against each of the four stockholder proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street Name Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder and fail to provide voting instructions, your broker is permitted to vote your shares on the ratification of the selection of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, without your voting instructions, your broker may not vote on any of the other proposals, and a "broker non-vote" will occur, which means your vote will not be counted with respect to such matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote after I return my proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registered Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered holder, you may change your vote at any time before your proxy is voted at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may do this in a number of ways.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First, you may cast a new vote by telephone or Internet, so long as you do so by the deadline of 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Time on Tuesday, May 9, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Second, you may complete and submit a new proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Third, you may send a written notice stating that you would like to revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose either of the latter two methods, you must submit your notice of revocation or your new proxy card to the attention of our corporate secretary (1001 Louisiana Street, Suite 1000, Houston, Texas 77002) so that it is received at or before the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, you may attend the annual meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simply attending the meeting, without voting in person, will not revoke your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Street Name Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder and you have instructed a broker to vote your shares, you must follow directions received from your broker to change your vote or to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What vote is required to approve each item?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be elected to the Board, a nominee must receive a majority of the votes cast, that is, the number of votes cast "FOR" a nominee's election must exceed the number of votes cast "AGAINST" such nominee's election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each other item, the affirmative vote by holders of a majority of the votes cast is required for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An instruction to "ABSTAIN" with respect to any such matter means your shares will not be voted, although the shares represented by such instruction will be counted for purposes of determining whether there is a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, an abstention will have the effect of a negative vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Voting Information for Street Name Holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder, your broker, trustee or other nominee will not be permitted to exercise voting discretion with respect to some of the matters to be acted upon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, if you do not give your broker, trustee or other nominee specific instructions, your shares will not be voted on those matters and will not be counted in determining the number of shares voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by such "broker non- votes" will, however, be counted in determining whether there is a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please communicate your voting decisions to your broker, trustee or other nominee before the date of the annual meeting so that your vote can be counted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Could other matters be decided at the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matters are properly presented at the annual meeting, your proxy, together with the other proxies received, will be voted at the discretion of the designated proxy holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For further information, please see "Other Matters" in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Do I have any dissenters' rights?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the laws of the State of Delaware, dissenters' rights are not available to our stockholders with respect to the matters to be voted on at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can attend the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to space and security concerns, only stockholders as of the close of business on the record date or their duly appointed proxy holders may attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are not able to admit guests of either stockholders or proxy holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission to the annual meeting will be on a first-come, first-served basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registration will begin at 9:00 a.m. local time, and seating will begin at 9:30 a.m. local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cameras, recording devices and other electronic devices will not be permitted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders and proxy holders will be asked to present valid picture identification, such as a driver's license or passport.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that if you hold your shares in street name, you will also need to bring the voting instruction card that you received from your broker or other nominee in connection with the annual meeting or a copy of a brokerage statement reflecting your stock ownership as of the close of business on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the annual meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The preliminary voting results will be announced at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The final results will be reported in a current report on Form 8-K that we will file with the SEC within four business days after the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will pay the expenses incurred in connection with the solicitation of my vote?

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible to our stockholders for the oversight of the company and recognizes that effective corporate governance is critical to achieving our performance goals while maintaining the trust and confidence of investors, employees, business partners and regulatory agencies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a set of Governance Guidelines that address the role, composition and functioning of the Board, which are posted on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub-section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recent Corporate Governance Changes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board and the Nominating and Governance Committee periodically review and evaluate our system of corporate governance to ensure that the interests of our Board and management continue to align with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On January 18, 2017, our Board unanimously adopted several changes to our corporate governance system described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board adopted Amended and Restated Bylaws to provide that nominees for director shall be elected by the affirmative vote of the majority of votes cast at a meeting of stockholders, with a plurality standard retained for contested elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board also amended our Governance Guidelines to provide that any nominee for director who does not receive the required votes for election shall tender his or her resignation, which will be considered by the Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board also adopted stock ownership guidelines which set forth our Board's expectation that each director and executive officer will continuously own KMI stock with a value equal to a specified multiple of his or her annual retainer or base salary as specified below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Title   Multiple of annual retainer or base salary, as applicable   Directors    3x  Chief Executive Officer    6x  All other Executive Officers    2x
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because our Chief Executive Officer currently receives only $1 of base salary per year, the guidelines provide that he or she will be expected to continuously own KMI stock with a value equal to at least six times the greater of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) his or her base salary or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the base salary of the highest paid executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors and executive officers are expected to meet these guidelines within five years of the later of becoming an executive officer or the date of adoption of the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until each executive officer has met the guidelines, he or she is expected to retain 50% of any shares of common stock received upon vesting of restricted stock or restricted stock unit awards, net of amounts withheld to pay taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The guidelines also prohibit directors, executive officers and persons residing in their households from holding KMI securities in margin accounts or entering into pledging transactions with respect to KMI securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, this prohibition does not extend to KMI securities owned by a director or executive officer in excess of the applicable minimum ownership guidelines or any securities with respect to which such person does not have a pecuniary interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibition on Hedging Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board amended our policy on securities trading and handling of non-public information to prohibit directors, executive officers and persons residing in their household from entering into speculative transactions, including hedges, with respect to KMI securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board adopted an executive compensation clawback policy which provides that cash and equity compensation paid to executive officers may, under certain circumstances, be recovered by KMI in the event of a restatement of KMI's financial results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Board Members
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has affirmatively determined that, based on a consideration of all relevant facts and circumstances, each of the following directors has no material relationship with us and is independent, as that term is used in the New York Stock Exchange ("NYSE") Listed Company Manual and as described in our Governance Guidelines: Ms. Macdonald and Messrs. Gardner, Hall, Hultquist, Kuehn,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Morgan, Reichstetter, Sarofim, Shaper, Smith, Staff, Vagt and Waughtal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our Board has determined that each member of our Audit Committee, Compensation Committee and Nominating and Governance Committee is independent for purposes of membership on such committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making its independence determinations, the Board considered the following relationships among our directors and found that they were not material and, thus, did not impair the affected directors' independence from us: Mr. Morgan is chairman and chief executive officer of Triangle Peak Partners, LP, a registered investment advisor and fun manager which manages investments for clients, including for Messrs. Kinder, Sarofim and Shaper.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amounts invested with Triangle Peak Partners by Messrs. Kinder, Sarofim and Shaper represent, in each case, insignificant percentages of their personal wealth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure and Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard D. Kinder served as both Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer of Kinder Morgan and its predecessors since his election in 1999.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective June 1, 2015, Steven J. Kean, then our President and Chief Operating Officer, became our Chief Executive Officer, and Mr. Kinder became Executive Chairman of our Board, thereby separating the offices of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The three-member Office of the Chairman, occupied by Mr. Kinder, Mr. Kean and our Chief Financial Officer, Kimberly A. Dang, remains unchanged.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Dang was appointed to the Board on January 18, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are committed to the highest standards of corporate governance.Our Board has in place the following measures, in addition to the new governance changes discussed above under "Recent Corporate Governance Changes," to ensure that we maintain these standards:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thirteen of our sixteen directors are independent, as described above;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Morgan, one of our independent directors, has been appointed by the Board as lead director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In his role as lead director, Mr. Morgan is responsible for moderating executive sessions of the Board's non-management directors, acting as principal liaison between the non-management directors and the Executive Chairman on matters dealt with in such sessions, and evaluating, along with the other independent directors, the Chief Executive Officer's performance and presenting such evaluation to the Chief Executive Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee, Compensation Committee and Nominating and Governance Committee are composed entirely of and chaired by non-management directors who meet the independence requirements of the NYSE and our Governance Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four of the five members of our Audit Committee qualify as "audit committee financial experts" as such term is defined in Item 407(d)(5)(ii) of SEC Regulation S-K;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee annually reviews the Chief Executive Officer's performance and compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee is responsible for succession planning for senior management, including for the Chief Executive Officer;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-management directors meet regularly, without the participation of the company's senior management, to review matters concerning the relationship of the Board with members of the company's management and such other matters as the lead director and participating directors may deem appropriate; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each year, the Nominating and Governance Committee conducts a review and evaluation of the conduct and performance of the Board and its committees based upon completion by each director of an evaluation form, or upon such interviews of directors or other methods as the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating and Governance Committee believes appropriate and suitable for eliciting the relevant information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board's Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has oversight responsibility with regard to assessment of the major risks inherent in our business and measures to address and mitigate such risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board is ultimately responsible for risk oversight at our company, the committees of the Board assist the Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities by considering the risks within their respective areas of expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, the Audit Committee assists the Board in fulfilling its risk oversight responsibilities relating to our risk management policies and procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this process, the Audit Committee meets periodically with management to review, discuss and provide oversight with respect to our processes and controls to assess, monitor, manage and mitigate potential significant risk exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In providing such oversight, the Audit Committee may also discuss such processes and controls with our internal and independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee likewise assists the Board in fulfilling its risk oversight responsibilities with respect to the management of risks associated with compensation program design by reviewing whether there are risks arising from our compensation programs and practices that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee assists the Board with oversight of risk management relating to corporate governance, Board organization and Board membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EHS Committee assists the Board with oversight of risk management relating to environmental, health and safety matters, including reviewing with management our reputation as a responsible corporate citizen and our efforts to employ sustainable business practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Communications with Our Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Interested parties may contact our lead director, Mr. Morgan, the chairpersons of any of the Board's committees, the independent directors as a group or the full Board by mail to Kinder Morgan, Inc., 1001 Louisiana Street, Suite 1000, Houston, Texas 77002, Attention: Corporate Secretary, or by e-mail to our investor relations department within he "Contact Us" section of our Internet website at www.kindermorgan.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any communication should specify the intended recipient.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All communications received in accordance with these procedures will be reviewed initially by our investor relations department.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our investor relations department will lay all such communications to the appropriate director or directors unless our investor relations department determines that the communication:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: does not relate to our business or affairs or the functioning or Governance Guidelines of our Board or the functioning or charter of any of its committees;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: relates to routine or insignificant matters that do not warrant the attention of our Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is an advertisement or other commercial solicitation or communication;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is frivolous or offensive; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: is otherwise not appropriate for delivery to directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director or directors who receive any such communication will have discretion to determine whether the subject matter of the communication should be brought to the attention of the full Board or one or more of its committees and whether any response to the person sending the communication is appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such response will be made through our investor relations department and only in accordance with our policies and procedures and applicable law and regulations relating to the disclosure of information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will retain copies of all communications received pursuant to these
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: procedures for a period of at least one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee will review the effectiveness of these procedures from time to time and, if appropriate, recommend changes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Material Legal Proceedings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no material legal proceedings to which any director, officer or affiliate of ours, or any record or beneficial owner of more than five percent of our common stock is a party adverse to us or any subsidiary of ours or has an interest adverse to us or any subsidiary of ours.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contributions to Charitable Organizations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In none of the last three fiscal years have we made payments to or received payments from any tax-exempt organization of which any of our independent directors is an employee, or an immediate family member of such director is an executive officer, that exceeded the greater of $1 million or two percent of such tax-exempt organization's consolidated gross revenue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Meeting Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we have no formal policy with respect to our directors' attendance at annual meetings of stockholders, we invite them to attend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Three of our directors attended the 2016 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Corporate Governance Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We make available free of charge, on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub-section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations," the Governance Guidelines, the charters of the Audit Committee, Compensation Committee, Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) Committee and Nominating and Governance Committee, and our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics (which applies to senior financial and accounting officers and the chief executive officer, among others).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We intend to disclose any amendments to our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and any waiver from a provision of that code granted to our executive officers or directors, in each case that would otherwise be disclosed on Form 8-K, on our website within four business days following such amendment or waiver.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information contained on or connected to our website is not incorporated by reference into this proxy statement and should not be considered part of this or any other report that we file with or furnish to the SEC.

sentences.text: We have a separately designated standing Audit Committee established in accordance with Section 3(a)(58)(A) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the "Exchange Act"), composed of Ms. Macdonald and Messrs. Reichstetter, Staff, Vagt and Waughtal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: of the Audit Committee, and Messrs. Reichstetter, Staff, Vagt and Waghtal have each been determined by the Board to be an "audit committee financial expert."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all of the members of the Audit Committee are independent as described under the relevant standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has a written charter adopted by our Board, which is posted on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub-section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations."

sentences.text: The Audit Committee met eight times during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee's primary purposes are to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitor the integrity of our financial statements, financial reporting processes, systems of internal controls regarding finance, accounting and legal compliance an disclosure controls and procedures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitor our compliance with legal and regulatory requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: select, appoint, engage, oversee, retain, evaluate and terminate our external auditors, pre-approve all audit and non-audit services to be provided to us, consistent with all applicable laws, by our external auditors, and establish the fees and other compensation to be paid to our external auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: monitor and evaluate the qualifications, independence and performance of our external auditors and internal auditing function; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: establish procedures for the receipt, retention, response to and treatment of complaints, including confidential, anonymous submissions by our employees, regarding accounting, internal controls, disclosure or auditing matters, and provide an avenue of communication among our external auditors, management, the internal auditing function and our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following sets forth fees billed for audit and other services provided by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP for the years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Year Ended December 31,       2016   2015   Audit fees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Includes fees for integrated audit of annual financial statements and internal control over financial reporting, reviews of the related quarterly financial statements and reviews of documents filed with the SEC. 2016 and 2015 amounts for audit fees include fees of $2,669,850 and $2,855,448, respectively, for GAAP and Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) audits of certain stand-alone financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) For 2016 and 2015, amounts include fees of $91,500 and $263,404, respectively, for Kinder Morgan Energy Partners, L.P., and $4,732 and $15,411, respectively, for KMI, billed for professional services rendered for other tax matters, including Internal Revenue Service assistance, and for general state, local and foreign tax compliance and consulting services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, for 2015, amount includes fees of $2,839,165 billed for professional services rendered for tax processing and preparation of 2014 Forms K-1 for unitholders of Kinder Morgan Energy Partners, L.P., and $574,658 for unitholders of El Paso Pipeline Partners, L.P.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All services rendered by PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP are permissible under applicable laws and regulations, and were pre-approved by our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has reviewed the external auditors' fees for audit and non-audit services for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has also considered whether such non-audit services are compatible with maintaining the external auditors' independence and has concluded that they are compatible at this time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, the Audit Committee is responsible for reviewing the external auditors' proposed audit scope and approach as well as the performance of the external auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also has direct responsibility for and sole authority to resolve any disagreements between our management and our external auditors regarding financial reporting, regularly reviews with the external auditors any problems or difficulties the auditors encountered in the course of their audit work, and, at least annually, uses its reasonable efforts to obtain and review a report from the external auditors addressing the following (among other items):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the auditors' internal quality-control procedures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) any material issues raised by the most recent internal quality-control review, or peer review, of the external auditors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the independence of the external auditors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the aggregate fees billed by our external auditors for each of the previous two fiscal years.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board's Compensation Committee is currently composed of five directors, each of whom our Board has determined to be independent under the relevant standards.

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has a written charter adopted by our Board which is posted on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub-section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations."

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is appointed by the Board to assist the Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board desires to provide a compensation program for officers and key management personnel pursuant to which they are effectively compensated in terms of salaries, supplemental compensation and other benefits on a basis that is internally equitable and externally competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the committee's primary purposes are to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review and recommend to our Board, or determine, as the case may be, the annual salary, bonus, stock awards and other benefits, direct and indirect, to be received by our Chief Executive Officer and other elected members of senior management;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review new executive compensation programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assess and monitor our director compensation programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review on a periodic basis the operation of our director and executive compensation programs to determine whether they are properly coordinated and are achieving their intended purpose;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: take steps to modify any executive compensation program that yields payments and benefits that are not reasonably related to executive and institutiona performance or are not competitive in the aggregate to programs of peer businesses;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: produce an annual report on executive compensation for inclusion in our proxy statement or annual report on Form 10-K, if required by the applicable rules and regulations of the SEC; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: periodically review and assess our compensation and benefits for employees generally.

sentences.text: The EHS Committee is composed of Messrs. Gardner, Hall and Vagt, with Mr. Vagt serving as the chair of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EHS Committee has a written charter adopted by our Board, which is posted on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub- section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EHS Committee met two times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The EHS Committee assists the Board in overseeing management's establishment and administration of our company's EHS policies, programs, procedures and initiatives, including those that promote the safety and health of our employees, contractors, customers, the public and the environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also periodically reviews with management our company's reputation as a responsible corporate citizen and our efforts to employ sustainable business practices consistent with our company's business purpose and values.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating and Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Governance Committee is composed of Messrs. Gardner, Hall, Kuehn and Sarofim, with Mr. Gardner serving as the chair of the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each of the committee members is independent under the relevant standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee has a written charter adopted by our Board, which is posted on our website at www.kindermorgan.com in the "Corporate Governance" sub-section of the section entitled "Media & Investor Relations."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee met two times in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee's primary purposes are to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: make recommendations regarding the size of our Board, to the extent the size of the Board may be changed in accordance with the company's bylaws
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identify individuals qualified to become members of our Board, and recommend director nominees to our Board for election at our annual meeting of stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identify from among the members of our Board and report to our Board on individuals recommended to serve as members of the various committees of our Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annually reevaluate our Governance Guidelines and recommend to our Board any changes that the Nominating and Governance Committee deems necessary or appropriate; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: periodically evaluate our Board's and committees' performances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee considers the following factors as it evaluates the qualifications of possible candidates: a candidate's experience, knowledge, skills, integrity, independence (as described in our Governance Guidelines), expertise, commitment to our core values, relationship with us, ownership of our equity securities, service on other boards, willingness to commit the required time and ability to work as part of a team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee also considers the current mix of viewpoints, backgrounds, skills, experience and expertise on our Board and the results of our Board's annual self-evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, the Nominating and Governance Committee considers the characteristics that our Board should reflect as set out in our Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Governance Guidelines require that our Board reflect the following characteristics:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: each director should be:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a person of integrity who is dedicated, industrious, honest, candid, fair and discreet;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: knowledgeable, or willing to become so quickly, in the critical aspects of the company's business and operations; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: experienced and skillful in serving as a member of, overseer of, or trusted advisor to, the senior management or board of at least one substantial corporation, charity, institution or other enterprise;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a majority of the directors will meet the standards of independence as prescribed in our Governance Guidelines and the NYSE rules; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our Board should encompass a range of talents, skills and expertise sufficient to provide sound and prudent guidance with respect to the full scope of our operations and interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that diversity is an important attribute of a well-functioning board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, the Nominating and Governance Committee is responsible for advising our Board on matters of diversity, including race, gender, culture, thought and geography, and for recommending, as necessary, measures contributing to a board that, as a whole, eflects a range of viewpoints, backgrounds, skills, experience and expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identifying and Evaluating Nominees for Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee seeks, screens and identifies individuals qualified to become Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates for director may also come to the attention of the Nominating and Governance Committee through other Board members, professional search firms, stockholders or other persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee evaluates and recommends to our Board nominees for election as directors at each annual meeting of our stockholders and persons to fill vacancies in the Board that occur between annual meetings of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In carrying out its responsibilities, the Nominating and Governance Committee evaluates the skills and attributes desired of prospective directors and, when appropriate, conducts searches for qualified candidates; selects prospective candidates to interview and ascertains whether they meet the qualifications for director described above and as otherwise set forth in the Governance Guidelines; recommends approval by the entire Board of each selected nominee for election as a director; and approves extending an invitation to join our Board if the invitation is proposed to be extended by any person other than the Chair of the Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Recommendations for Director Nominees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee will consider director candidates recommended by stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may communicate recommendations for director candidates to the chair of the Nominating and Governance Committee by following the procedures described under "Additional InformationStockholder Proposals for Our 2018 Annual Meeting."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the stockholder should provide such other information as such stockholder may deem relevant for the Nominating and Governance Committee's evaluation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chair of the Nominating and Governance Committee has discretion to determine whether the recommendation should be brought to the attention of the full Board and whether any response to the person sending the communication is appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such response will be made through our investor relations department and only in accordance with our policies and procedures and applicable law and regulations relating to the disclosure of information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our corporate secretary will retain copies of all recommendations received pursuant to these procedures for a period of at least one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee of the Board will review the effectiveness of these procedures from time to time and, if appropriate, make changes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board held seven meetings during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of our Board attended at least 75 percent of his or her aggregate board and committee meetings.

sentences.text: No Incorporation by Reference
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Report of the Audit Committee, the Report of the Compensation Committee and the performance graph included elsewhere in this proxy statement do not constitute soliciting material and should not be deemed filed or incorporated by reference into any of our other filings under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"), or the Exchange Act, except to the extent we specifically incorporate either such report or the performance graph by reference therein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Party Transaction Approval Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our written policy is that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) employees must obtain authorization from the appropriate business unit president of the relevant company or head of corporate function and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) directors, business unit presidents, executive officers and heads of corporate functions must obtain authorization from the non-interested members of the Audit Committee, for any business relationship or proposed business transaction in which they or an immediate family member has a direct or indirect interest, or from which they or an immediate family member may derive a personal benefit (a "related party transaction"), prior to any such transaction being entered into or consummated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any related party transactions that would bring the total value of such transactions to greater than $250,000 in any calendar year also must be approved by the Office of the Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any related party transactions that would bring the total value of such transactions to greater than $1 million in a calendar year must be referred to the Audit Committee for approval or to determine the procedure for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without weighting any factors, and recognizing that one individual may give more weight to one factor than another individual, we expect that the Audit Committee would consider, among other things, the nature, size and terms of the transaction, the extent of the interest of the related party in the proposed transaction and the existing relationship of the parties to the proposed transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders Agreement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2011, in connection with our initial public offering, we entered into a shareholders agreement with a group of shareholders referred to as the "Investors."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Investors consisted of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) Richard D. Kinder, our Executive Chairman;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) investment funds advised by or affiliated with entities that participated in our 2007 going private transaction (referred to as the "Sponsor Investors"); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) Fayez Sarofim, one of our directors, and investment entities affiliated with him, an investment entity affiliated with Michael C. Morgan, another of our directors, and William V. Morgan, one of our founders, and a number of other members of our management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, of the Sponsor Investors, only the funds affiliated with Highstar Capital, LP (collectively referred to as "Highstar") are still parties to the shareholders agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, certain provisions in the shareholders agreement no longer apply and are not described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, Mr. Kinder and the Sponsor Investors previously had rights under the shareholders agreement to appoint some of the nominees for our Board and to have their nominees serve on certain committees of the Board, but these rights have terminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Registration Rights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholders agreement contains registration rights provisions pursuant to which we may be required to register the sale of shares of common stock owned by Highstar and Mr. Kinder that were issued upon the conversion of their Class A shares and Class B shares, as applicable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: registration rights provisions, Highstar and Mr. Kinder will each have the right to require that we register resales of such shares of common stock having an aggregate value of at least $200 million, or such lesser amount that represents all of such holder's remaining shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will not be obligated to effect such a demand registration at any time that a shelf registration statement is effective, or if, in our good faith reasonable judgment, it is not feasible for us to proceed because of the unavailability of required financial statements, or during a blackout period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A blackout period, for this purpose, is any of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a regular quarterly blackout period when our directors and executive officers are not permitted to trade or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a 30-day period (which we may not invoke more than twice in any 12 month period) if the registration would cause the disclosure of specified types of non-public information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The registration rights provisions contain holdback provisions for us and certain holders of shares in the event of an underwritten offering of common stock having an aggregate value of at least $500 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have agreed not to effect any merger, amalgamation, consolidation, business combination or change of control or reorganization event or similar transaction or series of transactions in which we are not the surviving entity (other than solely for cash consideration) unless the surviving entity assumes these registration obligations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have agreed to indemnify and hold harmless each selling shareholder for whom we file a registration statement and such selling shareholder's affiliates and their respective officers, directors, managers, partners, agents and control persons against any losses relating to violations of applicable securities law by us in connection with such registration or offering (except to the extent such violations were caused by such selling shareholder) or untrue statement of a material fact contained in such registration statement, prospectus or preliminary prospectus or free writing prospectus or any omission of a material fact required to be stated therein or necessary to make the statements therein, in light of the circumstances under which they were made, not misleading.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Provisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholders agreement will terminate when none of the shareholder parties thereto hold any shares of common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendments to the shareholders agreement must be signed by us, if the amendment modifies our rights or obligations, and by specified shareholders party thereto if they own specified amounts of our capital stock or if the amendment would modify their rights or obligations adversely and differently from other holders of the same class or classes of capital stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our certificate of incorporation and bylaws, we have agreed to indemnify each of our current and former directors and officers, and may additionally indemnify any of our employees, agents or other persons, to the fullest extent permitted by law against all expense, liability and loss (including attorney's fees, judgments, fines, ERISA excise taxes or penalties and amounts paid in settlement) incurred or suffered by our directors or officers or those other persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have agreed to provide this indemnification for civil, criminal, administrative, arbitrative or investigative proceedings to the fullest extent permitted under the General Corporation Law of the State of Delaware.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, our directors and officers could be indemnified for their negligent acts if they met the requirements set forth above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have acknowledged that we are the indemnitor of first resort with respect to such indemnification obligations and that any obligations of Highstar and its affiliates to advance expenses or to provide indemnification and/or insurance for the same expenses or liabilities are secondary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also are expressly authorized to carry directors' and officers' insurance providing indemnification for our directors, officers and certain employees and agents for any liabilities incurred in any such capacity, whether or not we would have the power to indemnify such persons against such liability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
